document_data.caption: A loaf of rye bread, as depicted in [[Neverwinter (game)|Neverwinter]]
document_data.name: Rye bread
document_data.mainbody: '''Rye bread''' was a type of dense, darkly colored [[bread]] made from [[rye]]. It was often served alongside [[Dragon's Breath Beer]].
document_data.Availability: Rye bread was known to be served at the [[Bowels of the Earth]] tavern in [[Waterdeep]] and the restaurant [[The Painted Boat]] near [[Ravens Bluff]].{{Cite polyhedron/79/The Living City: The Painted Boat Restaurant|17}}
document_data.Reputation: Rye was a popular type of bread among many travelers in the [[Sword Coast]] due to maintaining freshness for a prolonged period of time.It was often served alongside [[Dragon's Breath Beer]].
